metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20633 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.Description: GNU patch through 2.7.6 contains a free(p_line[p_end]) Double Free vulnerability in the function another_hunk in pch.c that can cause a denial of service via a crafted patch file. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2018-6952.

notes.Note: sbeattie> this issue was introduced by the fix for CVE-2018-6952, which has not been applied to any Ubuntu release, due to a complete fix not being available.

criterions.comment: patch package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
